EN

In this podcast episode, Brett Tejpaul, Head of Coinbase Institutional, speaks with Camila Russo about the rapid acceleration of institutional adoption in the crypto sector over the past year. Tejpaul explains that the industry has reached a point of no return as major financial institutions are finally entering the space. The discussion highlights the growing integration between traditional finance and the digital asset ecosystem.

Key Points

  • Brett Tejpaul, Head of Coinbase Institutional, discusses the current state of crypto with Camila Russo.
  • Institutional adoption of crypto accelerated significantly last year.
  • The crypto industry has reached a point of no return with institutions finally entering the market.
